price: Sizin için, Allah’a ve ahiret gününe kavuşmayı ümit eden ve Allah’ı çokça zikreden kimseler için Allah Rasûlü’nde en güzel örnek vardır.
arabic: لَّقَدۡ كَانَ لَكُمۡ فِي رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ أُسۡوَةٌ حَسَنَةٞ لِّمَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَ وَذَكَرَ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad kāna lakum fī rasūli al-lahi us'watun ḥasanatun liman kāna yarjū al-laha wal-yawma al-ākhira wadhakara al-laha kathīran
